items.title: Catching Big Bass From The Bank with My Daughters
items.summary: The girls and I go back out to March's Pond to try for some trout. We didn't seem to get any bites for trout, but we all landed tournament worthy bass. Bobbers with nightcrawlers, lipless crankbait and a Texas-rigged Strike King worm seemed to…
items.content_html:
The girls and I go back out to March's Pond to try for some trout. We didn't seem to get any bites for trout, but we all landed tournament worthy bass. Bobbers with nightcrawlers, lipless crankbait and a Texas-rigged Strike King worm seemed to be the baits the fish wanted today.

items.title: Kayak Fishing Lake Woodlands | Largemouth Bass & Channel Catfish
items.summary: We are going to Lake Woodlands on the second voyage in my new Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 kayak. It's quite an eventful day catching a nice largemouth on a drop shot, then bringing in some nice channel catfish using nightcrawlers and chicken liver. Not…
items.content_html:
We are going to Lake Woodlands on the second voyage in my new Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 kayak. It's quite an eventful day catching a nice largemouth on a drop shot, then bringing in some nice channel catfish using nightcrawlers and chicken liver. Not to forget, I rip off my DBPower N5 Pro camera right off the bow, dumping it into the lake..... All in all, it was a great trip on the kayak.

First catch - 9:14
Hilarity - Camera ripped off of the bow - 13:06
Hilarity - Camera ripped off of the bow (slow-mo) - 13:12
Camera retrieved in net - 16:28
Second catch - 17:40
Third catch - 22:22
Fourth catch - 26:29

items.title: Lifetime Tamarack Angler Kayak Fishing for Bass and Crappie
items.summary: Join me on my maiden voyage with my new Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 Kayak. I go out to a nice, calm place just off of Spring Creek. I'm a novice and you can tell. But, I don't get skunked! Pull in my personal best…
items.content_html:
Join me on my maiden voyage with my new Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 Kayak. I go out to a nice, calm place just off of Spring Creek. I'm a novice and you can tell. But, I don't get skunked! Pull in my personal best white crappie and a largemouth. There will be many more adventures on the kayak.

items.title: Bottom Fishing for ... Bass! We go to March's Pond.
items.summary: My daughters and I go out to March's Pond, a new spot for us. We are fishing with night crawlers, chicken and an assortment of lures. But you'll be surprised at the catch. items.title: Winter Blue Catfish and Drum at Lake Houston
items.summary: My brother and I go to Lake Houston at Deussen Park on a dreary morning. We get into some nice blue catfish and a freshwater drum, all on nightcrawlers. Be Sure to SUBSCRIBE for New Videos Every Week - http://bit.ly/2LVRobp Follow me on Social…

items.title: Crappie, Sunfish, Hunting Birds?
items.summary: I go back to an old spot on Lake Holcomb, using Berkley Gulp Minnows and Nightcrawlers. I get to see a Crane out on it's morning hunt for breakfast! Bait Used: Berkley Gulp Minnows, Nightcrawlers SUBSCRIBE for New Videos Every Week - http://bit.ly/2LVRobp WATCH MORE…
items.content_html:
I go back to an old spot on Lake Holcomb, using Berkley Gulp Minnows and Nightcrawlers. I get to see a Crane out on it's morning hunt for breakfast!

items.title: New Spot Full of Fish??
items.summary: We try out a new spot, Spring Trails Lake, that we found on Fishbrain (no affiliation with Fishbrain, I just like the app) which had a ton of catches logged. We tried nightcrawlers, chicken livers, strawberry garlic hot dogs, cherry jello bacon and lures…
items.content_html:
We try out a new spot, Spring Trails Lake, that we found on Fishbrain (no affiliation with Fishbrain, I just like the app) which had a ton of catches logged. We tried nightcrawlers, chicken livers, strawberry garlic hot dogs, cherry jello bacon and lures to try to see if we can find the same fish as we've seen logged.

items.title: New Year's Day Catfish with my Daughter
items.summary: Maddie and I go to Lake Woodlands and Lake Holcombe to catch some big channel catfish! The baits we caught them on?? Chicken Liver and Strawberry Jello Garlic Hotdogs! Be Sure to SUBSCRIBE for New Videos Every Week - http://bit.ly/2LVRobp Follow me on Social Media:…
items.content_html:
Maddie and I go to Lake Woodlands and Lake Holcombe to catch some big channel catfish!

The baits we caught them on?? Chicken Liver and Strawberry Jello Garlic Hotdogs!
